title: Diamond Dazzle Bangles: Minimalist Grace in Gold
features: Delicate line bangles featuring petite floral diamond clusters in a prong setting. The sleek design offers a modern take on traditional Indian jewelry, perfect for everyday elegance.
colors: Golden yellow (18K Gold) and sparkling white (Diamonds).
occasions: casual get-togethers. A subtle statement for the modern woman.
description: Lightweight and comfortable for daily wear. The minimalist design allows for versatility, blending seamlessly with both traditional and Western outfits. Excellent diamond clarity ensures maximum sparkle and brilliance. A modern twist on classic bangle style.
